thread.title: Walmart edges closer to buying majority of Flipkart

title: Walmart edges closer to buying majority of Flipkart
text:
Walmart edges closer to buying majority of Flipkart 3:19pm BST - 01:51 
Walmart Inc is likely to reach a deal to buy a majority stake in Indian e-commerce player Flipkart by the end of June in what could be the U.S. retail giant's biggest acquisition of an online business, two people with direct knowledge of the matter said. Matthew Larotonda reports.

Matthew Larotonda reports.  //reut.rs/2HsAJd3
